name: Cold Storage Chaos
description:
Created for the UE4 Spring Jam 2020

Modifier: Army of One

The power to the fridge has gone out!  Now it is up to Miguel the mechanic mouse to repair it before all the food goes bad!  Utilize your fire stick to fend off spoiled food, and torch them to cook them to heal yourself!  

Controls:

Keyboard:

A D - Left Right

Space or W - Jump

Left Click - Hit

Left Mouse Hold - Torch

ESC - Pause

Controller:

(Menus do not support Controller and must be navigated with mouse)

Left Thumbstick - Left Right

Bottom Face Button - Jump

Right Trigger press - Hit

Right Trigger Hold - Torch

Start - Pause
